title: The Knight Captain Wants to Monopolize the Girl Who Had Glasses - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Possessive Characters   R-18   Saints   Transported to Another World
author: Takase Nazuna
description:
Rina's parents died in an accident when she was a child, and on the day of her beloved grandmother's funeral, she and her cousin Mayu are summoned to another world. However, Mayu is the only one who is needed, so Rina, who is treated as roadside trash, is picked up by the leader of the Second Knights Order...?
'I'm sure you've heard of it. I can heal you with my powers, so why don't you take off those thick glasses?'
'Oh, really?'
Following the old premise of the beauty with glasses, this is a story about a girl with glasses who doesn't realize how beautiful she is, and a knight captain who wants to monopolize her. 
>
